Title: Topkapi
Writer: Monja Danischewsky (screenplay), Eric Ambler (based on the novel "The Light of Day")
Actors: Melina Mercouri, Peter Ustinov, Maximilian Schell, Robert Morley
Plot: A small-time con-man with passport problems gets mixed up with a gang of world-class jewelry thieves plotting to rob the Topkapi museum in Istanbul. Turkish intelligence, suspecting arms smuggling, gets involved, and under pressure the con-man rises to heights he'd never dreamed of.
Language: English, French, Turkish, German, Greek, Italian
